explains: adj. 可预知的，可预料的

sentences.en: Profit and dividend growth looks above average for the foreseeable future.
sentences.cn: 利润和股息的增长看上去在可预见的将来会高于平均水平。

sentences.en: It seems to me that this crime was foreseeable and this death preventable.
sentences.cn: 在我看来这罪行是可预见的且这起死亡是可避免的。

sentences.en: They hold that the car will remain a leading means of urban travel in the foreseeable future.
sentences.cn: 他们认为，在可预见的将来，汽车仍将是城市交通的主要工具。
